Title: Local epsilon isomorphisms
Abstract: © 2015 by Kyoto University.In this paper, we prove the "local e-isomorphism" conjecture of Fukaya and Kato for a particular class of Galois modules, obtained by interpolating the twists of a fixed crystalline representation of Gqp by a family of characters of Gqp. This can be regarded as a local analogue of the Iwasawa main conjecture for abelian p-adic Lie extensions of Qp, extending earlier work of Kato for rank one modules and of Benois and Berger for the cyclotomic extension. We show that such an e-isomorphism can be constructed using the 2-variable version of the Perrin-Riou regulator map constructed by the first and third authors.
